title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2441/93 of 2 September 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1107/68 on detailed rules of application for intervention on the market in Grana padano and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheeses
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2441/93 of 2 September 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1107/68 on detailed rules of application for intervention on the market in Grana padano and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheeses
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 1107/68 is amended as follows:
1. In Article 3, the following paragraph 4 is added:
'4. Payment for the cheeses bought in by the intervention agency shall be made within a period commencing on the 120th day after entry into stock and ending on the 140th day after that date.'
2. Article 5 is amended as follows:
(a) In paragraph 1, '100 km' is replaced by '350 km';
(b) In paragraph 2, '0,035 units of account' is replaced by 'ECU 0,042'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 September 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
